Maybe a blend of recorder, mic, this new device and evp maker and let it rip?  Ron l

psi_research <vilhellm@...> wrote:          LC this is scary and amazing at the same time. Right now it's a neck
band. Next it'll be picking up thoughts if you're just in a room with
the receiver. I can see this being useful in many applications but it
has has the potential for misuse. With that said, it could verbalize
psychic impressions and I'm intrigued by that. -Bill 

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Stefan Bion" <yahoogroups@...> wrote:
>
> Does this really work? It's hard to believe that a speech can be
synthesized by only using the nerve signals which control the vocal
cords...
